text: Petre Ivănescu (15 April 1936 – 1 April 2022) was a Romanian handball player and coach. He played for Dinamo București and for Romania national team.Sporthelden.de: Alle Handball WeltmeisterIvănescu kehrt rumänischem Verband den Rücken He was born in Bucharest, Romania. His playing career began in 1954 and he retired in 1974. His managing career began in 1967 and he retired in 2005. Ivănescu died on 1 April 2022 in Essen, Germany from colon cancer at the age of 85.Petre Ivănescu ist tot ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Bucharest Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Germany
title: Petre Ivănescu
